name: Rush Too [Inspired Jam #1]
description:
In Rush Too, the player must race against time in a series of levels filled with obstacles in order to evade the 'chaser' and earn the best medals possible.

The levels get harder as you progress through the game! The Chaser moves considerably faster and the obstacles are more difficult to avoid, and cause greater impact when collided with. #arcade

Made for the INSPIRED jam, week 1: https://itch.io/jam/the-weekly-game-contest

It was endearing to see that my game, Rush, was the theme for this jam. This is a semi-sequel to Rush: https://minisoop.itch.io/rush-full-game

I would like to thank CylinderBox for organsing this jam! https://cylinderbox.itch.io/

I may or may not flesh this out in the future.

Play in browser, or download for yourself.
